projects.name: LessonCraft
projects.nextAction: Jeff rebuild in Xcode for all new features; set up lessoncraft.app domain routing; artwork similarity audit
projects.description: AI-powered LDS lesson & talk preparation app with documentary series, firesides, devotionals, live session, games, and study tools
projects.lastMilestone: Intent-driven home screen, share cards, unique artwork per card, voice roster locked, web preview pages — all shipped Feb 10

projects.name: LessonCraft Content Pipeline
projects.nextAction: Re-generate all audio with new voice roster (Jared/Cedar, Nathan/Ash, Sarah/Nova, Emily/Marin, Hannah/Sage, Kristi/Nova); artwork diversity improvements
projects.description: Content production: CFM Documentary (52 weeks), Easter series (3 sub-series, 15 eps), Morning Light devotionals (49 eps), Personal Firesides (10 eps), artwork library (113 pieces)
projects.lastMilestone: 126/126 episodes with audio on R2. All 6 series complete. 52 CFM cover images uploaded. Catalog live at api.aituned.io/api/catalog.

projects.name: Gospel Tuned Empire
projects.nextAction: Extract shared Swift Package core from LessonCraft for multi-faith apps
projects.description: Multi-faith app empire: LDS (LessonCraft), Catholic, Baptist (Pulpit Prep), Methodist (Wesley's Way), Lutheran, Buddhist, Bahá'í. Research complete for all faiths.

projects.name: Scrollwork
projects.nextAction: Build backend - AI video ad generation engine
projects.description: AI Ad Creative Platform — marketing agency in your pocket. Upload product images → AI generates scroll-stopping video ads for TikTok/Instagram/Facebook. Website live at scrollwork.net (waitlist).
projects.decisionQuestion: When to prioritize Scrollwork vs Gospel Tuned expansion?

projects.name: TermLinkky
projects.nextAction: Polish UI and fix stability issues
projects.description: Remote terminal + AI assistant for iOS/Android. Flutter client + Python server over Tailscale.

projects.name: JiggyBot
projects.description: AI-powered KVM for locked-down corporate environments. Air-gapped AI assistant via HDMI capture + USB HID. Codebase complete, needs hardware assembly.
projects.decisionQuestion: Hardware assembly needs Jeff's hands — when to schedule?

projects.name: RaceStream.net
projects.nextAction: Benchmark Ollama Qwen2.5-32B + SDXL on RaceStream server for free content production
projects.description: Motorsports live streaming platform. Replace $100K broadcast trucks with sub-$500 edge solution. Server also being used for local AI inference (Ollama + SDXL).

projects.name: TeamsActionLoop
projects.description: Microsoft Teams meeting action item tracker. AI-powered extraction from meeting transcripts. Next.js + Stripe + Microsoft Graph API.

projects.name: AI Tuned Art Library
projects.nextAction: Artwork similarity audit — flag too-similar pieces, generate replacements with varied compositions. 20 new diverse pieces being generated.
projects.description: Original AI-generated LDS devotional artwork. 113 pieces: 54 cfm-covers, 17 lesson-topics, 17 bible-stories, 15 easter, 10 children. Style: v3 LDS devotional. Generator: Gemini.
projects.lastMilestone: 113 items in R2. 52 CFM period-correct covers + 8 new fireside artwork pieces uploaded Feb 10. Diversity sub-agent generating 20 more.

projects.name: Command Center
projects.nextAction: Keep tracker data fresh via nightly audit. Add more dashboard views as needed.
projects.description: Jackbot's operational dashboard at localhost:3333. Project management, LessonCraft media dashboard, chairman directives, nightly audit cron.
projects.lastMilestone: Media dashboard shipped, nightly tracker audit cron installed — Feb 10

projects.name: Javabean (Voice System)
projects.nextAction: Export remaining voices to local XTTS
projects.description: TTS infrastructure — ElevenLabs + local XTTS cloning. Voices: Jackbot (9T9v), Codex/Samuel (vDch), Tayler, KIMI/Amelie, SultrySara.
